msItem.title: Þórðar saga hreðu
msItem.incipit: Þordur hiet madur son hørda Kara
msItem.colophon: hofumm vier ei heizt fleira af honumm med sannleika sagt, og lykur hier nu sógu Þordar hredu

msItem.title: Fertrams saga og Platós
msItem.incipit: Artus hiet kongur mióg megtugur og audugur
msItem.explicit: enn Fertram stirde Fracklandi allt til elle
msItem.finalRubric: og endumm vier so þessa sógu. Tantum.

msItem.title: Jökuls þáttur búasonar
msItem.incipit: Bue atte vid Fridu dottur Dofra
msItem.explicit: og atte mørg bórn þau töku riked effter hann
msItem.colophon: og likur so þessare sógu, hafe sa þøck sem skrifade og lika sa sm las og allir þeir sem hlitt hafa. Fynes

msItem.title: Jarlmanns saga og Hermanns
msItem.rubric: Hier Byriast Saga af Jallmanne og Þorbjørgu dygru
msItem.incipit: Vilhyalmur hefur kongur heitid hann riede firir Fracklande
msItem.finalRubric: og endar so saga af Hermane og Jallmanne og Þorbiørgu digru. Finis. Tantumm

msItem.title: Hálfdanar saga Eysteinssonar
msItem.rubric: Hier Byriar Søgu af Haldane Eisteins Syne
msItem.incipit: Þrandur hiet kongur vid hann er kiendur Þrand heimur y Nor veige
msItem.explicit: og er mart störmenne frä þeim kömt, i Norey og ørkneium
msItem.finalRubric: og endum vier so søgu þessa. Fines tantum

msItem.title: Sigurðar saga þögla
msItem.rubric: Hier Biriar Saga Af Sigurde Þegulä
msItem.incipit: A døgum Artus kongs hins fræga er riede firir Brettlande
msItem.explicit: og dräp nidur blä menn og berserke
msItem.finalRubric: og endar hier nu sógu äf Sigurde þógla. Ender

msItem.title: Grettis saga
msItem.rubric: Hier Biriast Saga af Gretter Asmundar Syne
msItem.incipit: Asmundur hærulängur var sonur Þor-grymz hæruslangz
msItem.explicit: Og þad med hversu mikell giptu madur Þorstirn Drömundur hafe verid a sinum efsta døgum
msItem.finalRubric: Endum vier nw søgu Gretters Asmundar sonar hins sterka.
msItem.note: Unidentified text (a second colophon to Grettis saga?) on fol. 220v. The text is partially obscured by a pastedown, but the final line reads: þier a lade i song og sess, son guds rade dvinar[?] ve ... Fines Tantum

supportDesc.foliation: Paginated (1-17, [2 unnumbered pages], 18-437 [438?]) in upper outer and upper inner corners. Pp. 409ff. paginated in lower corners.

decoDesc.decoNote: Interlace knot at the foot of fols. 88v, 135v and 220v.

additions.p: Manuscript waste in pastedowns and several additional leaves (flyleaves? - cannot tell from photographs). One pastedown and several other leaves appear to be parts of a letter or letters signed by a certain B.[H.?] Brinjulfsen. Presumably the initials at the foot of fols. 107v and 108r (B.B.) are his. One additional loose leaf(?) has the same signature and a date of 6 April 1793. The same leaf bears the autograph (of a child?): briniolfur ionson. Another leaf contains mention of a certain Jón Helgason á Bole.

origin.note: Dated ca. 1700 in Jónas Kristjánsson's typescript catalog, but a date of 1755 seems more likely based on the information within the colophon to Grettis saga on fol. 220r.

revisionDesc.change: Introduced repository auth file. Updated repository element pointing, adding @ref and removing @key.
Added template elements. Earlier information taken from description in Jónas Kristjánsson's typescript catalog, based on a description provided by Mikjel Sórlie in 1959.
Cataloged from photographs held in AMI.
